name: ERC173 contract ownership interface
description: This specification defines standard functions for owning or controlling a contract.

eventDecorators.name: Ownership transferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the owner is changed to a new address.

parameterDecorators.name: Old owner
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the old owner.

parameterDecorators.name: New owner
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address of the newly configured owner.

functionDecorators.name: Owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: Transfer ownership
functionDecorators.description: This function will update the owner of the contract to the address provided as the parameter.

parameterDecorators.name: New owner
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the wallet to be configured as the new contract owner.
